name: Adventurers of Skye the Slime Maid
name_original: Adventurers of Skye the Slime Maid
description:
Join the cool and sociable MC's RPG medieval themed, romance-comedy, fantasy visual novel adventures with his magical, beautiful, monster girl, slime maid to be the best Adventurers in the country.

Genre: Comedy, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life

Romance: B x G 

Rating: 13+  (Mild Language, Mild Sexual References and Alcohol References) Demo  Only

Playtime: 45-60 minutes 

After departing from his old team, the protagonist of the game: Alex Goldstone is now a solo Adventurer exploring the land of Bromwich. He currently helps the city of Tipton with its new Guild Centre with other Adventurers that do quests for the community. 

After weeks of assisting Tipton, Alex became a respectable Guild member to the townsfolk. He's doing well on his starting point, but everything changes when he encounters a slime.

A beautiful and noisy goddess called Larissa, the goddess of life and fertility saw Alex save the slime from a wolf attack and he took it home.

To reward the lone adventurer for his rare act of kindness, she transforms the slime into a magically, humanoid slime maid to serve her new master.

Since it’s Skye’s new dream to be an Adventurer like her master, Alex enrolls her to be a new Guild member for Tipton.

Alex and Skye will have many missions, fight choice-based creatures and bosses, meet new friends along the way. The bond between Alex and Skye will grow romance-like, and we’ll learn more about Alex’s past in this comedy-romance, drama, fantasy, and fake RPG themes visual novel. Join their quest!

Skye's voice actress is played by Shakyra Dunn. She's best known for Roya in Angelic Waves.

Tara's voice actress is played by Kristen McGuire. She's best known for Ruri in Dr Stone, Cinnamon in The Nekopara Anime, Milim Nava in the popular anime, That Time I Got Reincarnated As A Slime, and more.

Lizabeth's voice actress is played by Blair Greene-Osako. A newcomer in the VA community.

Larissa's voice actress is played by Michelle Lee. She's best known for Sumire in Missing Time, Chloe in Sophistry and more.

Thomas's voice actor is played by Brandon P Jenkins. They best known for Klay in Brok: The Investigator, Jack Jones in Adventures of Jack Jones, and more.

Director/Writer/Programmer/Character Design: Jaygee598

Background (BG) Artists: ReefMeizer, Irsanmiftah, Necromew, Arixaf, Romaji
